name: Rally
long_description: Rally is a financial platform designed for fleets in Europe. We help blue-collar businesses like truckers, tradesmen and utilities, track all their vehicle and driver costs in one place with real-time data and AI-powered workflows for accounting and sustainability reporting. Our flagship product is a universal fleet card that covers fuel, EV charging, parking, tolls and more, with dynamic spend controls and fraud protection. At Rally, weâ€™re building the financial backbone for transportation, enabling payments, credit, invoicing, tax rebates, driver payroll and beyond.
